p: Application of glucocorticoids could to some extent alleviate lung injury of patients with severe infectious atypical pneumonia. However, long-term and abundant use of glucocorticoids may generate numerous side effects, and it is an undisputable fact that hormones may induce femoral head ischemic necrosis.
